faq.title: Frequently <highlight>Asked Questions</highlight>
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our process, services, and how we can boost your business.
faq.expertsHere: Our experts are here for you.

q1.question: What services does Group Digital Concept offer?
q1.answer: We offer a full range of services in communication, digital marketing, website creation, app development, and much more to meet each client’s specific needs.

q2.question: How does the website creation process work?
q2.answer: We follow a structured process: discovery of your needs, UX/UI design, technical development, content integration, rigorous testing, and launch, followed by management training.

q3.question: What are the timelines for creating a website?
q3.answer: Timelines vary depending on complexity. A showcase site usually takes 2–4 weeks, while an e-commerce or custom app may require 6–10 weeks.

q4.question: What is SEO and why is it important?
q4.answer: SEO (Search Engine Optimization) improves your visibility on Google. It is essential to attract qualified organic traffic, increase your reputation, and generate leads without paid ads.

q5.question: Can I manage my website once it is created?
q5.answer: Absolutely. We build our sites (WordPress, Shopify, or custom) with intuitive admin interfaces and train you to be fully autonomous.

q6.question: What is UX design and why is it important?
q6.answer: UX Design (User Experience) makes your visitors’ navigation easier. Good UX increases time on site, reduces bounce rate, and significantly boosts conversions.

q7.question: Do you offer digital marketing services?
q7.answer: Yes, we are experts in digital strategy: online advertising (Google Ads, Facebook Ads), social media management, content marketing, and email marketing to maximize your ROI.

q8.question: Can I have a mobile-responsive website?
q8.answer: It is a standard for us. All our sites are developed 'Mobile First', ensuring perfect viewing and navigation on smartphones, tablets, and computers.

q9.question: Do you offer support after the website is created?
q9.answer: Yes, we offer various maintenance packages to ensure security, updates, and long-term evolution of your website.

q10.question: How can I get a quote for my needs?
q10.answer: Simply contact us via our online form, email, or phone. We will analyze your project and provide a detailed, personalized quote within 24 hours.
